likeItemListIntro: Here you’ll see your liked items
loginInstruction: How do you want to proceed?
phoneInputInstruction:
If you don’t have an account with Dibble, we’ll create one for you in a moment.
In any case, we’ll need your phone number
emailVerificationInstruction_1: We sent you an email to the address
emailVerificationInstruction_2:
Click on the link will create an account for you in Dibble.
If you didn’t receive an email, try checking the spam folder
emailNeedReason: We need your email to send you invoices
phoneNeedReason: Your phone number will help us improve your account security. In the next step we’ll send you a one-time validation code via SMS
businessAccountExplain: If you have a business account you can get credit and other terms
enterCodeFromSms: Enter the code you received in SMS
notReceiveCode: Didn’t receive the code? Send again
orderReasonPlaceHolder: e.g. renovation, special project, etc. (for personal use)
clickToChangeMeanPayment: Click here to change means of payment
payWithCheckDescription: Available for verified accounts only, what to verify?
costDeliveryToDistantLocation: Cost of delivery to distant location
costDeliveryToDistantLocationDescription: Shipping to a place farther than 1.0 km costs a little more
